#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
#define MOD 1000000007
 
typedef long long LL;
 
int arr[1005][1005],N,M;
 
LL dp[1005][1005];
 
LL Solve(int i,int j)
{
    if(i==N and j==M) return 1;
    if(dp[i][j] != -1) return dp[i][j];
    LL res=0;
    if((i+1) <= N and arr[i+1][j]==0) res=res+Solve(i+1,j)%MOD;
    if((j+1) <= M and arr[i][j+1]==0) res=res+Solve(i,j+1)%MOD;
    return dp[i][j]=res%MOD;
}
 
int main()
{
    int K;
    while(scanf("%d %d %d",&N,&M,&K)==3)
    {
        int a,b,c,d,f=0;
        memset(arr,0,sizeof arr);
        for(a=1;a<=K;a++)
        {
            scanf("%d %d",&b,&c);
            arr[b][c]=1;
        }
        memset(dp,-1,sizeof dp);
        if(arr[1][1]==1)
        {
        printf("0\n");
        continue;
        }
        printf("%lld\n",Solve(1,1));
    }
    return 0;
}
